gui

Class GlobalMarkingProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • gui.PropertiesDialog
                • gui.MarkingProperties
                  • gui.GlobalMarkingProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GlobalMarkingProperties
extends MarkingProperties
    Class GlobalMarkingProperties shows window, where user can set MarkingLayer Properties: Marking color, shape, size, thickness and transparency. Given settings will affect to all MarkingLayers in all ImageLayers.
    Author:
    Antti Kurronen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
